mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Pets (Type, Name, Owner_ID, Animal_ID) values (#{petType}, #{name}, #{ownerID}, #{animalID})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, Type, Name, Owner_ID, Animal_ID, Age FROM Pets WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE Pets set Type = #{petType}, Name = #{name}, Owner_ID = #{ownerID}, Animal_ID = #{animalID}, Age = #{age} WHERE ID = #{petID}
